```{=html}
<style>
  /* measure navbar + announcement and drive layout with CSS vars */
  :root { --navbar-h: 56px; --announce-h: 0px; }

  /* remove Quarto’s extra paddings; we’ll provide our own 10px */
  main.content, .column-page { padding: 0 !important; margin: 0 !important; }

  /* make the main content a flex column that occupies the viewport under navbar */
  #quarto-document-content {
    min-height: calc(100vh - var(--navbar-h) - var(--announce-h));
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    padding: 10px;                 /* your uniform 10px padding */
    gap: 10px;                     /* space between title and iframe */
  }

  /* Break out of Quarto's centered content column */
  .page-layout-full main.content,
  .page-layout-full .column-page,
  #quarto-document-content {
    max-width: none !important;
    width: 100% !important;
    margin-left: 0 !important;
    margin-right: 0 !important;
  }
  
  /* Remove extra container padding so only your 10px padding applies */
  #quarto-content {
    padding-left: 0 !important;
    padding-right: 0 !important;
  }

  /* keep the title visible, normal flow */
  header.quarto-title-block { margin: 0; }

  /* the iframe wrapper takes all remaining space; footer lives outside main */
  .iframe-flex {
    flex: 1 1 auto;
    overflow: hidden;              /* prevents double scrollbars from padding */
    border-radius: 6px;            /* optional nicety */
  }

  /* iframe fills the wrapper */
  #example1 {
    width: 100%;                   /* avoid 100vw overflow */
    height: 100%;
    border: 0;
    display: block;
  }
</style>

<script>
  // Set --navbar-h / --announce-h to actual pixel heights
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    const nav = document.querySelector('#quarto-header nav.navbar');
    const ann = document.querySelector('#quarto-announcement');

    function setHeights() {
      const navH = nav ? nav.offsetHeight : 0;
      const annH = (ann && !ann.classList.contains('hidden')) ? ann.offsetHeight : 0;
      document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--navbar-h', navH + 'px');
      document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--announce-h', annH + 'px');
    }
    setHeights();
    window.addEventListener('resize', setHeights);
  });
</script>

<div class="iframe-flex">
  <iframe
    id="example1"
    src="https://0198ec54-fb71-461d-e5b7-15ab6dec6129.share.connect.posit.cloud"
    loading="lazy"
  ></iframe>
</div>
```
